title.rendered: “Our new office, planned facility in KEZAD strengthens our commitment to ‘Make it in the Emirates’ initiative”: Huseyn Tarek

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Huseyn Tarek
Regional President, MEA&CIS
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]For the past 10 years, our facility in Jebel Ali Free Zone has been at the heart of our operations, where we have been integrating cutting-edge solutions for the region and demonstrating our commitment to “Make it in the Emirates” program.

I am thrilled to announce that we are strengthening our commitment to “MAKE it in the Emirates” program even more by expanding our Emirati presence to Khalifa Economic Zones, Abu Dhabi (KEZAD). While we have been at the forefront of this initiative for the past decade, we’re taking it to the next level with the opening of a new office in KEZAD.

But that’s not all. We are in the process of establishing an integration facility right here in KEZAD. This facility will not only add to our operational strength but also allow us to stay even closer to our key customers & partners while adding more to our in-country value creation and enhancing our export capacity.

We take pride in our role as a hub for excellence. From our facilities in the Emirates, we export to the entire Middle East, Africa, and CIS regions, delivering the quality and innovation you’ve come to expect from INTECH.

Our expanded presence and upcoming integration facility in KEZAD, combined with our longstanding commitment to “Make it in the Emirates,” solidify our dedication to providing you with end-to-end solutions and adding strength to the local economy. Whether you’re in the oil and gas sector or venturing into the energy future, we’re here to partner with you.

Thank you for your continued trust in INTECH as we embark on this exciting journey![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

“Our expanded presence and upcoming integration facility in KEZAD, combined with our longstanding commitment to “Make it in the Emirates,” solidify our dedication to providing you with end-to-end solutions and adding strength to the local economy. Whether you’re in the oil and gas sector or venturing into the energy future, we’re here to partner with you.”

          – Huseyn Tarek, Regional President[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
